author: sauliusgrigaitis
content: It would be nice to have basic statistics in text what CLs (with counts) the client is connected too. This would help to identify is there are some issues with particular pairs of CLs.

author: barnabasbusa
content: you can click on your peer, and you will see inbound and outbound connection with peername (if peername is known)

author: sauliusgrigaitis
content: yea, but I'm big believe in short summaries with counts

author: sauliusgrigaitis
content: so in my thinking aggregated information here https://dora.pectra-devnet-2.ethpandaops.io/clients/consensus would be valuable
